entry.title: $2495 // Spacious Modern Apt *25 Min to NYC* New Appliances Central Air Heat
entry.content:
Great 3 bedroom apartment, In the heart of Bushwick, just 2 blocks from the Myrtle Wyckoff L/M train station.

1503 Gates Avenue Brooklyn, NY 11237 (at the corner of Irving)

NEIGHBORHOOD: Bushwick has quickly become one of the newest fun areas to live in! You are close to the giant Food Bazaar grocery store, 2 blocks from a Planet Fitness gym, and are surrounded by cute coffee shops, bars, and restaurants.

Call, Text, Hec @ show contact info if interested! Mention 'Gates' NO Broker Fee

Looking for laid back and respectful tenants to occupy this apartment for the first time, enjoying:
- Closets in Every Room
- Central Air
- Hardwood Floors Throughout the Apartment
- Brand New Stainless Steel Appliances in the Kitchen
- Full Bathroom with Tub

Don't miss the opportunity to check this place out!

Looking for tenants to sign a 1 year lease, credit checks run for all tenants, guarantors accepted.

First month and 1 month security required for move-in.

Call, Text, Hec @ show contact info if interested! Mention 'Gates' NO Broker Fee
